description:
Today I'm wearing my Grandfather's vest once again and looking at what greeted Oasis fans when they tried to buy tickets for the upcoming reunion tour; long queues, crashed sites and rising prices. Why did it happen and is any of it right?

Apologies for the tiredness on show in this video; I had a very late night following a Shirtless Season festival performance in Jersey with The Darkness. I blame Texas. 

I will be returning with another Comments Day episode very soon, so please do deposit your thoughts below.

To go behind the scenes with me or to join a monthly Zoom Call Night, head over to my Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/jushawk

For Cameo messages: https://www.cameo.com/justinhawkins

Justin Hawkins Rides Again...The Podcast. You can listen to the archives on Apple Podcast, Spotify etc: https://open.spotify.com/show/0hQYjIww4Rfaka9Fqc11mX?si=ab25d61ba0c74618

Get a Justin Hawkins Rides Again T-Shirt & Hoodie here: https://thejawsofvictory

#reaction #musicnews #music #oasis
title: The Oasis Ticket Fiasco: Dynamic? Hardly.
